DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the efficacy and safety of PARIET twice daily (b.i.d.) in patients with Proton Pump Inhibitor-resistant reflux esophagitis
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life in New Treatable Therapy as Rabeprazole Option for Refractory Reflux Esophagitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria; Proton pump inhibitorresistant reflux esophagitis. (Patients who have mucosal breaks (erosions, ulcers) on endoscopy) Exclusion criteria; Patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any ingredients of PARIET. Patients on atazanavir sulfate.
